desc: Probable 20% damage reduction, 30% boost to Def, max HP & enormously boosts BB gauge and greatly restores HP for 3 turns when guarding

dictionary.lore: A legendary shield said to have been crafted by Rau Reik, a simple swordsmith, upon speaking with a goddess during his travels. It's said that those who use the shield receive protection from the goddess, and never suffer arrow wounds on the battlefield. Legends also say that the shield picks its owner, and those who have not gained the recognition of the goddess can never lay their hands on it no matter how hard they try.

name: Pulsing Cloak
